name: JOURNEY TO OBLIVION
description:
JOURNEY TO OBLIVION  is a brand new and original game for the SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis. It's a developing spaceship game in which you'll have to defend planet Earth from alien invasion.

Programming: Alexsandro Vinicius Mendes 

Desing Art: Rafael Melo 

Music: Paulo H.G.Ferreira (aka LinkueiBR) 

Voice: Nardonio Lopez (Mardex Fordex)

Support:

Matheus Castellar - Music and Programming

 Mauro Flores (aka Irian Shonobi) -Programming

Web Site

E-mail: megastudios.igames@gmail.com
